about_the_game:
Savage Gears is a violent, single-player FPS inspired by early 2000s objective-oriented action games.

Armed with an Iron Fist and an arsenal of devastating weaponry, you play as Ero Lei'Bourne, a fearless soldier, on his dangerous mission to save the continent from the brink of annihilation.

STORY

Set in alternate history East Africa, you follow the journey of Ero Lei'Bourne on a Special Forces operation to thwart an arms race conspiracy ... or die trying.

FEATURES

  • Experience intense action in the single-player campaign

  • Wield a range of fictional sci-fi-inspired weapons

  • Harness the power of the Iron Fist as you Smash your way through enemies in intense, first-person combat

  • Fight against a dynamic range of relentless hordes of mercenaries, drones, and experimental mutant soldiers

  • Explore a diverse range of environments from Fort Speke to train levels to forest environments and more
